description:
We're expanding our roster of talented freelancers!

Are you an experienced Senior Designer, with experience in the design of campaigns, activations and installations within the retail and brand activation space? If so, we'd like to connect with you!

As a freelance Senior Designer at IMA you will need:

  • 4+ years as a Senior Designer
  • Experience setting key visuals for campaigns and projects
  • Strong conceptual and creative thinking in your work
  • You must have excellent execution skills, creating multiple design options, all on brief and on time
  • The ability to pick up and lead on projects with confidence, ensuring plenty of time for amendments and review
  • Agency experience is a must, specifically working on retail campaigns and brand activations

We are looking for Senior Designers who will be available on a freelance or contract basis for upcoming projects... so if that sounds like you, please get in touch today!
